feature.label: QuickImage
feature.description: The QuickImage plugin provides an eclipse-editor for viewing images. You can browse images one by one, or all as thumbnails. Use the toolbar to navigate or by single- or double-clicking the images. By default QuickImage associates its editor with .gif .jpg .jpeg .png .bmp .ico
